product_name: The North Face Kallispell Triclimate Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Kallispell Triclimate jacket gives you three ways to beat winter weather: the waterproof, insulated shell and heavyweight fleece liner sweater can be worn together or separately. What makes this Triclimate unique is that it's designed in a longer length and the shell fabric has a heathered look, giving it a more urban appeal. HyVent(R) shell is waterproof and breathable and insulated with Heatseeker(TM) insulation, offering a great warmth-to-weight ratio and is highly durable and compressible. Heatseeker fill is varied to reduce bulk: 80g in body, 60g in sleeves and hood. The North Face Kallispell Triclimate jacket features a removable, adjustable hood and pit zips so you can customize the warmth to your activity level. 300-weight sweater fleece has zippered handwarmer pockets. Shell offers zippered hand pockets and an internal media pocket.
short_description: The North Face Kallispell Triclimate jacket gives you three ways to beat winter weather: the waterproof, insulated shell and heavyweight fleece liner sweater can be worn together or separately.
